heroTitle: Welcome to a space where your cycle meets calm, clarity, and care… ✨
heroSubtitle: A gentle companion for your rhythm, wellbeing, and everyday comfort.
howItWorksTitle: Your Journey to Wellness in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorksSubtitle: Start feeling more in tune with your body’s natural rhythm today.
step1Description: Answer a few simple questions to personalize your experience. It's quick, easy, and secure.
step2Description: Log symptoms, mood, and period days. The more you share, the smarter HerFlow gets.
step3Description: Unlock personalized AI plans, understand your cycle phases, and connect with a supportive community.
discoverRhythmTitle: Discover the Rhythm of Your Body
discoverRhythmSubtitle: HerFlow transforms cycle tracking from a daily task into a beautiful ritual of self-discovery. See your health patterns unfold in a way that’s intuitive, insightful, and deeply personal.
companionSubtitle: You’re never alone on your wellness journey. Get AI-powered support and connect with others who understand.
aiGuideDescription: Based on your logged symptoms, our AI creates personalized daily wellness plans and offers gentle, supportive chat — anytime, anywhere.
communityDescription: Share experiences, ask questions, and find comfort in our private forum. A space for real talk, without judgment.
trustTitle: Built on a Foundation of Trust
valueScienceDescription: Our insights are grounded in scientific research to provide you with reliable and accurate information.
valueEmpathyDescription: Created with empathy to be a safe, non-judgmental space for your health journey.
valuePrivacyDescription: Your personal data is yours alone. We are committed to protecting your privacy with the highest standards.
finalCtaTitle: Your body has a story. HerFlow helps you understand it.
alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in
